properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:44AM EST until February 6 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh PA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of
around one tenth of an inch.

* WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Westmoreland Ridges and Fayette
Ridges Counties. In Maryland, Garrett County.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

Please report snow or ice by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the
NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY
